text: Ewane bune file (hene! Ewan ji bona) pexemberen xwe ra gotine: â€œ(Ji van her du reyan hune yeki ji xwe ra hilbijerin); ya eme we ji welate xwe derxin (idi em gohdarya we nekin) ya hune (disa werin) ola komal e me." (Dema pexember ji baweriya wan be hevi bune) idi Xudaye wan ji wan ra niqandiye: "(Geli Pexemberen min! Hun bi miruz nebin, bi rasti) eme cewrkaran tesqele bikin
